description: Saving money and getting your personal finances under control can be hard, but this online course will help you do just that.
title: This online course will help you save tons of cash
title_page: This online course will help you save tons of cash - Business Insider
text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships, so we get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
euforic services via flickr After a month of splurging on presents for our loved ones, it will come as no surprise when most of us try to save money come January.
Whether it's to travel to that dream holiday destination, pay off student loans, or just to live more self-sufficiently, saving money will definitely be a top priority for 2017.
This, however, is easier said than done. After all, the world of finance is a confusing and dangerous place for those who don't know its ins and outs.
Luckily, the Udemy course "Finance for Freedom: Master Your Finances in 30 days" aims to help you understand what money is in just 30 days.
Joe Withrow, the founder of the course, will teach you how to analyse your personal statement, become more money-conscious, slash debts, and will show you how to invest in a sound manner to make more cash. Who could say no to a course which not only helps you get your cash flow under control, but will also help you make more?
The course currently boasts a cool 4.7 stars and 46 ratings on Udemy, with tons of positive reviews on Josh's teaching methods, understandable curriculum, and engaging course.
The class, which usually costs £85, will now only set you back a mere £21 using the code "UDEMY1275" at checkout.
Finance for Freedom: Master Your Finances in 30 days, £21 (originally £85) [75% off with code "UDEMY1275"]
